languages.text: "Я... потратил века на обуздание своего дара. Я вел за собой... целый мир и пронзал взглядом... будущее на эпохи вперед. И даже я... на пределе, жадно хватаюсь за крохи того, что когда-то называл своей душой, лишь бы вымолвить еще хоть слово. Кто дал тебе спесь считать, что справишься лучше?"

traits.locale_text: "Я потратил века на обуздание своего дара. Я вел за собой целый мир и пронзал взглядом будущее на эпохи вперед. И даже я уже на пределе, жадно хватаюсь за крохи того, что я когда-то называл своей душой, лишь бы вымолвить еще хоть слово. Скажи мне, мон-кай, ты правда считаешь, что справишься лучше? Что ж, тогда этот венец воистину твой по праву".
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"
languages.original_text: "Я... потратил века на обуздание своего дара. Я вел за собой... целый мир и пронзал взглядом... будущее на эпохи вперед. И даже я... на пределе, жадно хватаюсь за крохи того, что когда-то называл своей душой, лишь бы вымолвить еще хоть слово. Кто дал тебе спесь считать, что справишься лучше?"

traits.locale_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future epochs in advance. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think that you will fare better?"
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: “我……曾耗费几百年的时光掌握我的天赋。我曾……引导着整个世界，我的目光……可以洞悉未来，察觉那些尚未发生的事情。可即便是我……也被逼到了极限。我拼命抓住灵魂微弱的气息，只为了能说出几句话。你何来的自信，以为你会比我撑得更久？”
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: “我……曾耗费几百年的时光掌握我的天赋。我曾……引导着整个世界，我的目光……可以洞悉未来，察觉那些尚未发生的事情。可即便是我……也被逼到了极限。我拼命抓住灵魂微弱的气息，只为了能说出几句话。你何来的自信，以为你会比我撑得更久？”
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: «Me... me pasé eones utilizando mi don. Guie... un mundo entero. Mi mirada... atravesaba el futuro, hasta épocas lejanas. E incluso yo estoy... al límite, aferrándome desesperadamente a los exiguos vestigios de lo que antaño era mi alma solo para pronunciar otra palabra. ¿Cómo has adquirido la osadía que te hace creer que a ti te irá mejor?».
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: «Me... me pasé eones utilizando mi don. Guie... un mundo entero. Mi mirada... atravesaba el futuro, hasta épocas lejanas. E incluso yo estoy... al límite, aferrándome desesperadamente a los exiguos vestigios de lo que antaño era mi alma solo para pronunciar otra palabra. ¿Cómo has adquirido la osadía que te hace creer que a ti te irá mejor?».
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Ich ... habe Äonen damit zugebracht, meine Gabe zu nutzen. Ich habe ... eine ganze Welt geführt. Mein Blick ... hat die Zukunft durchbohrt, hat Epochen vorausgesehen. Und selbst ich habe ... meine Grenzen erreicht, klammere mich verzweifelt an die dürftigen Überreste dessen, was ich einst meine Seele genannt habe. Nur um noch ein weiteres Wort zu sprechen. Woher nehmt Ihr die Dreistigkeit, zu glauben, Ihr würdet Euch besser schlagen?"
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... habe Äonen damit zugebracht, meine Gabe zu nutzen. Ich habe ... eine ganze Welt geführt. Mein Blick ... hat die Zukunft durchbohrt, hat Epochen vorausgesehen. Und selbst ich habe ... meine Grenzen erreicht, klammere mich verzweifelt an die dürftigen Überreste dessen, was ich einst meine Seele genannt habe. Nur um noch ein weiteres Wort zu sprechen. Woher nehmt Ihr die Dreistigkeit, zu glauben, Ihr würdet Euch besser schlagen?"
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: 「私は…長い年月にわたって己の才を役立ててきた。私は世界全体を…導いてきた。我がまなざしは…未来を見通し…先々の時代を予見した。そんな私でさえ…もう限界だ。ただもう一言話すためだけに、かつて己の魂と呼んだわずかな残骸に必死にしがみついている有様だ。それでもまだ頑張れるなどと思う厚かましさを、いったい誰がお前に与えたのだ？」
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は…長い年月にわたって己の才を役立ててきた。私は世界全体を…導いてきた。我がまなざしは…未来を見通し…先々の時代を予見した。そんな私でさえ…もう限界だ。ただもう一言話すためだけに、かつて己の魂と呼んだわずかな残骸に必死にしがみついている有様だ。それでもまだ頑張れるなどと思う厚かましさを、いったい誰がお前に与えたのだ？」
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: « J'ai... passé des millénaires à cultiver mon don. J'ai présidé à la destinée... d'un monde entier. Mon regard... a percé le voile du futur et contemplé les époques à venir. Et pourtant, je suis aujourd'hui... à bout de forces et je m'accroche désespérément aux maigres reliques de ce qui était autrefois mon âme pour prononcer ces quelques mots. Comment pouvez-vous avoir l'audace de croire que vous pourrez faire mieux ? »
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... passé des millénaires à cultiver mon don. J'ai présidé à la destinée... d'un monde entier. Mon regard... a percé le voile du futur et contemplé les époques à venir. Et pourtant, je suis aujourd'hui... à bout de forces et je m'accroche désespérément aux maigres reliques de ce qui était autrefois mon âme pour prononcer ces quelques mots. Comment pouvez-vous avoir l'audace de croire que vous pourrez faire mieux ? »
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Çağlar boyunca hediyemi dizginlemeye çalıştım. Koca bir dünyaya kılavuzluk ettim. Bakışlarım geleceği delip devirler ötesini gördü. Artık tükenmiş olsam da bir kelime daha edebilmek için bir zamanlar ruhum dediğim şeyden geri kalan az biraz parçaya çaresizce sarılıyorum. Sana aynısını yaşamayacağını düşündüren nedir?"
languages.original_text: "I... spent aeons harnessing my gift. I guided... an entire world. My gaze... pierced the future, looking epochs ahead. And even I am... at my limit, clinging desperately to the meagre relics of what I once called my soul just to speak another word. Who gave you the audacity to think you will fare any better?"

traits.locale_text: "Çağlar boyunca hediyemi dizginlemeye çalıştım. Koca bir dünyaya kılavuzluk ettim. Bakışlarım geleceği deldi ve devirler ötesini gördü. Artık sınırıma ulaşmış olsam da bir kelime daha konuşabilmek için bir zamanlar ruhum dediğim şeyden geri kalan az biraz parçaya çaresizce sarılıyorum. Sana daha iyi olacağını düşünecek cüreti kim verdi?"
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer
